name: Shared Sorrows
description:
As Hayato Seinaru starts his career as an educator, he must overcome the sorrows of his past while tending to his students who have sorrows of their own.

This is my first visual novel, along with my first project entirely! Please, provide constructive criticism and help me improve my writing/coding/rendering! The best place to do so, along with connecting with the community is through my discord server!
